pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![icpp](https://github.com/icppWorld/icpp/actions/workflows/cicd.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/icppWorld/icpp/actions/workflows/cicd.yml)# icppModern C++ for the [Internet Computer](https://internetcomputer.org/).## What is icppicpp is a command-line application for compiling C++20 code to WebAssembly that runs in a canister of the Internet Computer.For details, see [docs.icpp.world](https://docs.icpp.world/) !
